TextEng: "I have no complaints."
"The bed was hard as a rock, and I don't remember requesting the drow."
Text: "침대는 바위처럼 딱딱했고, 드로우를 요청한 기억도 없는데요."

TextEng: "Are you joking, man? I was robbed of everything I own!"
Text: "농담하는 겁니까? 제 소유의 모든 것이 도난당했어요!"

TextEng: "Aside from the thief in my room, very much so."
"The drow will pay for this! I want my stuff back!"
Text: "드로우는 이 대가를 치를 겁니다! 제 물건을 돌려받고 싶어요!"

TextEng: "But why would they steal my equipment?"
"What do you have planned?"
"Would Halaster still even be alive?"
"Enough talking, already. Let's go!"
"And how are we supposed to do that?"
"So who's all going on this mission?"
"The attackers are drow. Why do you think Halaster is involved?"
"Maybe something happened to Halaster."
Text: "어쩌면 할라스터에게 무슨 일이 생긴 걸지도 모릅니다."

TextEng: "Why you? Why don't the Lords of Waterdeep deal with this?"
Text: "왜 당신입니까? 워터딥의 군주들이 직접 처리하지 않는 이유가 뭐죠?"

TextEng: "And what's the reward if we do?"
"I haven't agreed to anything just yet, Durnan."
"Very well. I will be right back."
"Are you saying you didn't anticipate this could happen?"
Text: "이런 일이 일어날 수 있다는 걸 예상하지 못했다는 말씀인가요?"

TextEng: "I'd like to go down into the well now. Maybe I can find something."
Text: "지금 우물로 내려가고 싶습니다. 뭔가 찾을 수 있을 것 같네요."

TextEng: "I'm not your errand <boy/girl>. Go upstairs yourself."
Text: "전 당신의 심부름꾼이 아닙니다. 직접 위층으로 가세요."

TextEng: "Do you want me to go after them?"
"And how am I supposed to survive Undermountain?"
"And what do I get in return for this?"
"Surely there are others who can help!"
Text: "분명 도울 수 있는 다른 사람들이 있을 텐데요!"

TextEng: "I'll take my chances on my own."
"Hey, I like Deekin!"
"All right. I'll do it."
"Why don't you come with me, Durnan?"
"I'll do my best."
"I'll be going now."
"I'm ready to go into Undermountain now."
"I'd like some questions answered."
"I don't have any more questions."
"Is there a temple in the area?"
"What should I be looking for when I'm down there?"
"I'd like to know more about these attacks."
"I want to ask something else."
"What are the attackers trying to accomplish?"
"Why aren't the entrances to Undermountain simply closed?"
Text: "언더마운틴의 입구를 그냥 닫아버리지 않는 이유는 뭡니까?"

TextEng: "Why shouldn't it be possible?"
"How long have these attacks been going on?"
"What drastic measures?"
"Is it only the drow who have been attacking the city?"
"I'd like to know more about Undermountain, itself."
Text: "언더마운틴 그 자체에 대해 더 알고 싶습니다."

TextEng: "Are there any maps of Undermountain that exist?"
"How do I get out of Undermountain once I'm in?"
"You can't teleport in Undermountain?"
"I have a relic that allows me to teleport through the planes."
Text: "차원을 가로질러 순간이동할 수 있는 유물을 가지고 있습니다."

TextEng: "What can I expect to face when I'm down there?"
"Tell me more about Halaster."
"I think I get it now."
"So it's a dungeon full of traps, then?"
"Has Undermountain been a problem before?"
"You said it goes down to the Underdark?"
"Where can I get some supplies?"
<StartCheck>[Bluff]</Start> "I'm broke. Some coin up front would be helpful."
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> "Some gold for equipment could really help out my quest."
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> "장비 살 금화가 있으면 임무에 큰 도움이 될 겁니다."

TextEng: "What are you going to be doing while I'm down there?"
Text: "제가 거기 있는 동안 뭘 하실 겁니까?"

TextEng: "I had a dream, before the thief came..."
"Actually, never mind. It was probably nothing."
Text: "사실, 신경 쓰지 마세요. 아무것도 아닐 겁니다."

TextEng: <StartAction>[Tell him about the dream.]</Start>
"I don't care for having my head messed with."
"I'm not all that concerned about it, really."
"You think the dream was sent by an ally?"
"Perhaps you're more out of practice at this than you thought."
Text: "아무래도 당신 생각보다 감이 많이 무뎌진 것 같군요."

TextEng: "What was that thing?"
"What now, then?"
"Hmm. Do you think that maybe this was planned?"
"I'm ready to enter Undermountain."
"The drow are led by someone called the Valsharess."
"A reward? That's the kind of talk I like to hear!"
"Seems like I'm the only one good for anything around here."
Text: "이 근처에서 뭔가 할 수 있는 건 저뿐인 것 같네요."

TextEng: "Fine, I'll help you *again*."
"I guess you have a point. What do you want me to do?"
"What do you want me to do?"
"No, Durnan, use your gold to help the people of the city."
Text: "아닙니다, 더난. 당신 금화는 도시 사람들을 돕는 데 쓰세요."

TextEng: "I think Halaster has been captured by the drow."
"I think I deserve a reward for what I've done so far."
Text: "지금까지 한 일에 대한 보상을 받을 자격이 있다고 생각합니다."

TextEng: "Never mind, Durnan. Save your gold to help those in need."
Text: "신경 쓰지 마세요, 더난. 금화는 도움이 필요한 사람들을 위해 아껴두세요."

TextEng: "It sounds like Halaster has disappeared."
"I'll look into this some more."
"So, is there some kind of reward for this information?"
Text: "그래서, 이 정보에 대한 보상 같은 게 있습니까?"

TextEng: <StartCheck>Persuade - Bluff </Start> "I'm not going back into Undermountain until I get some kind of reward!"
Text: <StartCheck>설득 - 허세 </Start> "어떤 보상을 받기 전까지는 언더마운틴에 다시 안 들어갑니다!"

TextEng: <StartCheck>Persuade - Intimidate</Start> "I came up with some info, now you better come up with some gold... if you know what's good for you."
Text: <StartCheck>설득 - 위협</Start> "정보를 가져왔으니, 이제 금화를 내놓는 게 좋을 겁니다... 자신에게 이로운 게 뭔지 안다면."

TextEng: <StartCheck>Persuade</Start> "Surely this information is worth something, Durnan."
"Keep your reward, Durnan. Use it to help others."
Text: "보상은 가지세요, 더난. 다른 사람들을 돕는 데 쓰십시오."
